titles.title: Calling upon the Government of China to account for those detained during March 2008 protests and to recognize the fundamental human rights of all Tibetans, including monks, nuns, and innocent civilians, currently detained by the Government of China.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/10/2008--Introduced. Calls on Chinese officials to: (1) account for the status of detained individuals; (2) allow international observers to visit detention facilities and the Tibet Autonomous Region; and (3) adhere to international standards of due process and justice when bringing to trial those charged with formal offenses.
